articles.title: Trump officials contacted El Salvador president about Kilmar Ábrego García, sources say
articles.description: Administration in touch with Nayib Bukele over detention of wrongly deported man, according to two people
articles.content: The Trump administration has been in touch directly with the Salvadorian president Nayib Bukele in recent days about the detention of Kilmar Ábrego García, the man wrongly deported to a notorious prison in El Salvador, according to two people familia... [4032 chars]

articles.title: US and Ukraine sign minerals deal after Trump presses Kyiv to pay back US for helping repel Russia
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The U.S. and Ukraine on Wednesday signed off on a deal that will give Washington access to Ukraine's vast critical minerals and natural resources, finalizing an agreement weeks in the making to compensate the U.S.

articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Trump campaign chief claims he visited Australia to advise Liberals at start of election campaign
articles.description: Exclusive: Chris LaCivita, Trump’s presidential campaign co-manager, tells undercover reporters he advised on ‘structural issues’ related to Peter Dutton; the Coalition denies LaCivita was involved in campaign in any way
articles.content:
One of the architects of Donald Trump’s 2024 victory claims he made an unpublicised visit to Australia to advise the Liberal party about “structural issues” related to Peter Dutton ahead of the federal election.
The veteran Republican strategist Chri... [4444 chars]

articles.author: The Indian Express
articles.title: US economy hit by import surge, shrinks in Trump’s first 100 days
articles.description: The timing of report—coinciding with Donald Trump’s first 100 days in office—has amplified public criticism of his handling of the economy.
articles.content:
The US economy contracted in the first quarter of 2025, shrinking at a 0.3 per cent annualised rate as businesses rushed to import goods ahead of rising costs driven by tariffs, according to government data released Wednesday.
The Commerce Department... [2324 chars]

articles.title: US and Ukraine sign minerals deal that solidifies investment in Kyiv’s defense against Russia
articles.description: Move seals a deal to create a fund the Trump administration says will begin to repay roughly $175bn provided to Ukraine
